description: A list of links to related or external content that may be embedded in a story as a unit. Can be used for curated re-circulation, or simple 'More Information' boxes. Each item in the list must be an interstitial link.
title: Link List

$eref.description: A grab-bag object for non-validatable data.
$eref.title: Has additional properties

$eref.description: An optional list of output types for which this element should be visible
$eref.title: Channel trait

___description.description: Additional text about the link. May or may not be considered part of the link, depending on implementation.
___description.title: Link Description

___url.description: The interstitial link url. This is where the user should be taken if they follow this link.
___url.title: Link URL

___content.description: The interstitial link title text. This text should be considered part of the link.
___content.title: Link Title

___image.description: An optional image. This should be considered part of the link.
___image.title: Link Image

$eref.description: A globally unique identifier of the content in the ANS repository.
$eref.title: Globally Unique ID trait

___title.description: The title of the list. Plain-text with no formatting.
___title.title: Title

$eref.description: A user-defined categorization method to supplement type. In Arc, this field is reserved for organization-defined purposes, such as selecting the PageBuilder template that should be used to render a document.
$eref.title: Subtype or Template

$eref.description: A property used to determine horizontal positioning of a content element relative to the elements that immediately follow it in the element sequence.
$eref.title: Alignment
